rules_text: When this creature enters, if you have five or more different mana values among cards in your graveyard, each opponent loses 4 life.

When MV4 Pillabegg Siege Squad enters the battlefield, if you have four or more different mana costs among cards in your graveyard, each opponent loses 3 life.
